tasks.fmt: deno fmt deno.json main.ts main_test.ts apps shared tests
tasks.fmt:check: deno fmt --check deno.json main.ts main_test.ts apps shared tests
tasks.lint: deno lint main.ts main_test.ts apps shared tests
tasks.check: deno check main.ts main_test.ts apps/**/*.ts shared/**/*.ts tests/**/*.ts
tasks.ci: deno task fmt:check && deno task lint && deno task check --frozen && deno task test --frozen
